title: Paparazzi
description: A rock star TRUST story...Iris wants to be a journalist, but can she ever make it big when she has no money for college?Rock star Thomas splits his time between the recording studio and baking cookies.When she fell, literally, in his arms, sparks start to fly, and the lustful attraction is immediate.Which wouldn’t be a problem if Thomas wouldn’t be a celebrity and Iris a paparazzo. And if Iris would tell him the truth before he discovers it. And if Thomas would stop showing up at her house being the perfect mix of cute and sexy!It’s going to be HARD to stay away from him...While the romance in PAPARAZZI is a stand-alone, the plot is a continuation of events that began in BACKSTAGE (Roadies series #1). It is strongly recommended you read BACKSTAGE prior to reading this novel. Enjoy!
author: Erika Vanzin
